text: ولم تكن له فئة ينصرونه من دون الله وما كان منتصرا

translations.translation: There was no group to come to his aid, besides Allah, and he was not given any help.
He had no body to help him other than God, nor was he able to save himself.
And there was no host, beside Allah, to help him, nor could he be of any help to himself.
He had no one besides God to help him, nor could he himself achieve any success.
And he had no group to help him against Allah, nor was he capable of taking revenge.
And he had no group of men to help him against Allah, nor could he defend (or save) himself.
And he had no host to help him besides Allah nor could he defend himself.
But there was no host to help him, apart from God, and he was helpless.
And he had no troop of men to help him as against Allah, nor could he save himself.
He had no party to help him against God, nor was he able to defend himself.
And there could be no party suceouring him as against Allah, nor could he himself be an avenger.
He had no party to help him, besides Allah, nor could he help himself.
Nor had he numbers to help him against Allah, nor was he able to deliver himself.
And he had no group of men to help him against Allah, nor could he defend or save himself.
He had no host to help him besides Allah, and he was helpless
He had no faction to help him besides God, and he was helpless.
And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself.

[18:43] But there was no (read takun or yakun) party, [no] persons, to help him, besides God, at the moment of its destruction, nor could he help himself, at the moment of its destruction, [all by] himself.
(And he had no troop of men to help him as against Allah) i.e. against Allah's punishment, (nor could he save himself) from Allah's punishment.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُ فِئَةٌ يَنصُرُونَهُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ } معناه جَماعةٌ

translations.translation: And His saying - {There is no group that will help him against Allah} - means a community.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُ } حينئذ { فِئَةٌ يَنصُرُونَهُ } على مقتضى مباهاته ومفاخرته بالأعوان والأنصار من بأس الله وأخذِه بل لا ناصرَ له { مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ } أي: استنصر منه
 واستغفر عما صدر عنه من الجراءة والجرائم فقد نصرَه وعفا عنه وإن عظمت زلته { وَمَا كَانَ } أيضاً بنفسه على مقتضى استبداده وثروته { مُنْتَصِراً } [الكهف: 43] مخلّصاً مُنْجِياً نفسه عن امثال عن أمثال هذا النكال

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ ولم تكن له فئةٌ }: جماعة { ينصرونه }: يقدرون على نصره بدفع الهلاك عن أمواله
 { من دون الله } 
 فإنه القادر على ذلك وحده
 { وما كان منتصرًا } أي: وما كان في نفسه ممنوعًا بقوته من انتقامه سبحانه منه
